topics.body:
I'm finally going to try and put a stop to my horrible procrastination.

First up, I'm only going to watch stuff that I haven't seen before. (No more old episodes of Game grumps, No more old TGWTG reviews, No anime or Toku episodes that I've already seen.)

i'm getting excited for christmas

weird thing though
my mom was saying to my dad, that they should give me my present early, because it was present, and not anyone else's business
and not i overheard, they were saying in the same room as me

and now i'm super duper curious
like what the hell are they getting me, that they don't want anyone else to know about
